general: Sensor: 1/5” CMOS Sensor Board Lens Focal Length: 4 mm F/No: 1.5 Minimum illumination: 0 lux (IR on) Focus Depth: 20 cm ~ infinity View: Digital Zoom: 4x Horizontal: 38.0° Vertical: 28.7° Diagonal: 46.5°
antenna: 1 x detachable 2 dBi dipole antenna (Reverse-SMA connector)
receivingsensitivity: 802.11b: -89 dBm at 11 Mbps 802.11g: -74 dBm at 54 Mbps 802.11n: -71 dBm at 150 Mbps
daynight: Built-in ICR Indoor night vision (IR) for distances up to 7.5 meters
power: Input: 100 ~ 240Vac, 50/60 Hz, 0.2A Output: 12Vdc, 1.2A external power adapter
pantilt: Pan: -170° ~ +170° Tilt: up 90°and down 25° Auto-Patrol preset positions: 24
datarate: 802.11b: up to 11 Mbps 802.11g: up to 54 Mbps 802.11n: up to 150 Mbps
audio: Built-in omni-directional microphone Sensitivity: -38 dB +/- 3 dB (5 meters max) Frequency: 100~20000 Hz S/N: >60 dB Format: PCM
